instant.title: Instant Sharing

password.title: Password Protection

expire.title: Auto-expiration

analytics.title: View Analytics

fast.title: Lightning Fast

secure.title: Encrypted & Private
secure.description: Content is encrypted in transit & at rest. You can delete it permanently anytime.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Quick answers to the questions we get asked most often.

whatIs.question: What is a URL shortener?
whatIs.answer: A URL shortener turns long web addresses into short, easy-to-share links that still point to the original page.

howWork.question: How does Shrnkly work?
howWork.answer: Just paste your long URL, click shorten, and get a short link you can customize, track, protect and turn into a QR code.

isFree.question: Is Shrnkly free?
isFree.answer: Yes — the core features (shortening, basic stats, QR codes) are completely free forever. Premium plans unlock custom domains, advanced analytics, and higher limits.

canTrack.question: Can I see who clicks my links?
canTrack.answer: Yes! You get detailed analytics: click count, countries, cities, devices, browsers, referrers, and time trends.

customDomain.question: Can I use my own domain?
customDomain.answer: Yes — on paid plans you can use yourbrand.link, go.yourdomain.com, etc. to create fully branded short links.

howLong.question: Do short links expire?
howLong.answer: By default, no — they last forever. You can optionally set expiration dates on any link.

limit.question: Is there a limit on free accounts?
limit.answer: Free users can create up to 100 short links per month. Paid plans offer unlimited links.

safe.question: Are the links safe?
safe.answer: We scan URLs for malware, use HTTPS everywhere, and offer password protection (premium) to keep your audience safe.

cta.subheading: We're here to help — just reach out to our support team.

textShareFaq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
textShareFaq.subheading: Common questions about sharing text, code and notes.

whatIs.question: What is text sharing?
whatIs.answer: A simple way to turn any piece of text, code, markdown or notes into a private or public shareable link.

howWork.question: How does it work?
howWork.answer: Paste your content, choose formatting (plain, markdown, code), optionally add password/expiration, and get an instant link.

isFree.question: Is text sharing free?
isFree.answer: Yes — basic sharing, password protection, expiration and view tracking are free. Premium unlocks unlimited shares and more controls.

passwordProtect.question: Can I password-protect shares?
passwordProtect.answer: Yes — add a password so only people who know it can see your content.

expiration.question: Can I make shares expire?
expiration.answer: Yes — set any future date and time. After that the content is automatically deleted.

howLong.question: How long do shares last?
howLong.answer: They last until the expiration date you set, or until the view limit is reached — whichever comes first.

limit.question: Is there a limit on free accounts?
limit.answer: Free users can create up to 10 text shares. Paid plans offer unlimited shares.

secure.question: Is my content secure?
secure.answer: Yes — encrypted in transit and at rest. You control deletion, expiration and access.

cta.subheading: Can't find the answer? Just send us a message — we're happy to help.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: At Shrnkly we care deeply about your privacy. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it when you use our service.

collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect only the information necessary to provide our service:
infoList: URLs you shorten and where they point

use.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use this data to deliver the service, show you analytics, prevent abuse, improve features, and keep the platform safe and fast.

analytics.title: 4. Click Analytics
analytics.content: When someone clicks a short link we collect anonymized data (approximate location, device type, referrer, browser) to provide you with useful statistics.

security.title: 5. Security
security.content: We use industry-standard security practices. While no system is 100% secure, we work hard to protect your data.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using Shrnkly you agree to these Terms of Service. If you don't agree, please don't use the service.

description.title: 2. Our Service
description.content: Shrnkly lets you shorten URLs, track clicks, generate QR codes, and share text securely. We may update or change features at any time.

responsibilities.title: 3. Your Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: You must not use Shrnkly to:
infoList: Link to illegal or abusive content

expiration.title: 4. Content & Expiration
expiration.content: We don't own the content you shorten or share. We may disable links that violate these terms. Free links may have usage limits.

property.title: 5. Our Intellectual Property
property.content: The Shrnkly name, design, code and logo are ours. You may not copy or use them without permission.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We provide the service “as is”. We are not responsible for lost profits, data loss, or service interruptions.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or harm the platform or other users.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We're here to help
contact.description: Have a question, suggestion or just want to say hi? Drop us a message.
contact.name: Name

chat.title: Prefer
chat.description: Check our FAQ first or send us an email — our team usually replies very quickly.
